title: About 🤓🧮🤖
text:
About 🤓🧮🤖

We’re a bunch of data scientists and engineers who use machine learning and artificial intelligence to project who will score first, and how they’ll do it, for every NBA and WNBA regular season and playoff game.


Then we check the odds at the most popular sportsbooks throughout the day, and use artificial intelligence to spot and alert our users on plays with positive expected value (+EV).


We’re always adding new markets and books to our tools. Subscribe today!

title: Subscribe 🪧🆙
text:
Subscribe 🪧🆙

All of first basket projection data and alerted plays are exclusively found in the Slam Dunk Discord server, via WHOP.

(And don’t do it through iOS if you can avoid it, Apple will charge you an extra fee.)

title: Welcome to Slam Dunk Bets 🏀💰
text:
Welcome to Slam Dunk Bets 🏀💰

Want to know more than the sports books?


Want the best first basket plays and data?


We’ve been using ML and AI to identify the best picks since sports betting apps were legalized. We’re always adding new books and prop markets to our tools and projections.


Subscribe today!

Set limits, and gamble responsibly! Gambling is addictive, including sports betting, and if you or someone you know is suffering from the consequences of problem gambling, don’t wait to get help.
